title: Assistant for Scrap Mechanic
aboutContent:
Why did I bother to build this? 
I had really been enjoying playing around with Flutter and had decided to set up a template for a future project I had in mind. It was going to be a website and mobile app with one code base written in Flutter. I got the project working but it felt pointless since the game I was writing it for was only going to be released in a year, so I decided to test my template skills on Scrap Mechanic, to see how long it would take me to get a working app and website

P.S. I also have a blog, Inside my Mind - by Kurt Lourens. I havent been making use of it as much as I could have, but I have some articlesðŸ˜‹.

donationDescrip: For now all features of the app are available to you, there are no PayWalls. However I do want to give extra features to those who do donate or contribute, but I do not have any benefits at this moment. If you like this App please give me a review in the Play/App Store and donate if you can
